security: Revealing that AMDENIM-1 is providing RADOP candidates for infiltration into PBRUMEN could compromise intelligence sources and methods. Mentioning GYROSE COMMO and ANDENIM may expose sensitive communication channels or operational code names. Directly quoting: “SUBJ REFA IS RADOP CANDIDATE PROVIDED BY AMDENIM-1 FOR INFILTRATION INTO PBRUMEN.”
summary: A message from JMWAVE to the Director regarding a RADOP candidate provided by AMDENIM-1 for infiltration into PBRUMEN, to replace a subject who failed a COMMO assessment test.
summary_one_paragraph: On January 16, 1963, JMWAVE sent a classified message to the Director concerning a RADOP candidate supplied by AMDENIM-1 intended for infiltration into PBRUMEN. This candidate is meant to substitute the subject of reference B, who was unsuccessful in a COMMO assessment test. The message references previous communications (WAVE 3348 and WAVE 2246) and includes a comment requesting a POA (Power of Attorney) on Benicia (Gonzalez) Gomez.
title: GYROSE COMMO ANDENIM
